artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Designer: Jack Prince; Mill: Park Adams (printer); Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Worsted satin print. Stacked 6" x 5" squares framed in 2.5" border designs. 34" vert. Rpt. Blue & gold on dark amber. (This piece has cotton in the warp & something other than wool mixed in weft.) Amber (2)
